mapper.select: SELECT PARENT_USER_ID,IS_MAIN,RELATIONSHIP,USER_NAME FROM STARCLOUDPORTAL.SCE_INFO_STUDENT_PARENT_REL r LEFT JOIN STARCLOUDPORTAL.SCE_COMMON_USER u ON r.PARENT_USER_ID=u.USER_ID AND u.IS_DELETE=1 WHERE STUDENT_USER_ID=#{id}

SELECT b.ID,USER_NAME,RELATIONSHIP,APPLY_USER_ID FROM STARCLOUDPORTAL.SCE_BINDING_APPLY b LEFT JOIN STARCLOUDPORTAL.SCE_COMMON_USER u ON b.APPLY_USER_ID=u.USER_ID AND u.IS_DELETE=1 WHERE TARGET_USER_ID=#{id} AND b.IS_DELETE=1 AND b.APPLY_RESULT=0
